base.description: Base init msg, sets memory address

deposit_asset.description: Asset required to deposit into the etf.

provider_addr.description: Address of the service provider which receives the fee.

token_code_id.description: Code-id used to create the LP token

AddOnInstantiateMsg.description: Used by Module Factory to instantiate AddOn

Decimal.description:
A fixed-point decimal value with 18 fractional digits, i.e. Decimal(1_000_000_000_000_000_000) == 1.0

The greatest possible value that can be represented is 340282366920938463463.374607431768211455 (which is (2^128 - 1) / 10^18)
